Custom styles
format:
<style>

    .large-text span {
        font-size: 26px !important;
    }
    
    .environment-text span {
        /*font-size: 26px !important;*/
    }

    .large-gauge-text span {
        font-size: 26px !important;
        padding-top: 15px !important;
        padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    }
    
    .small-gauge-text span {
        font-size: 18px !important;
        padding-bottom: 3px !important;
    }
  
    .nrdb-ui-gauge-title {
        font-size:16px;
        font-weight: normal;
    }
    
    .v-card-title {
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #8FC7FF;
    }
    
    .v-btn__content {
        font-size: 18px;
    }
    
    .v-list-item-title {
        font-size: 18px !important;
        padding-top: 3px !important;
        padding-bottom: 3px !important;
    }
    
    /*.v-snackbar__content {*/
    .alert {
        font-size: 16px;
    }
    
    .grayout {
        pointer-events: none;
        filter: opacity(50%);
        /*display: none;*/
    }
    
    .error {
        color: #FFD61A;
        font-weight: bold;
    }
    
    .modified {
        color: #94E3FE;
    }
    
}
</style>

name: Disable zoom
format: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no, minimal-ui">

name: Disable text selection
format:
<style>
    /* Disable text selection across the entire dashboard */
    body, .nr-dashboard-template, .nr-dashboard-container {
        user-select: none;
        -webkit-user-select: none; /* Safari/Chrome */
        -moz-user-select: none; /* Firefox */
        -ms-user-select: none; /* Internet Explorer */
    }
</style>
